hotels.title: Dresden Stylish City Stay Minutes from Royal Palace
hotels.description: A contemporary stay in the heart of Dresden's historical centre, Hotel Indigo Dresden - Wettiner Platz, an IHG Hotel, brings the treasures of this heritage city within easy reach. Wake refreshed in a stylish guest room with sumptuous bedding before starting your morning revitalising your body at the fitness centre. End your day with a tasty snack or cocktail at VOLT bar. Experience the art and culture Dresden has to offer from this cultured gateway.
